title: karuNincha raadha
sahitya:
karuNinca rAdA karivaradA nannu

anupallavi

 taruNmau gAdA dAnava bhEdA tanuvu nIdE gAdA gAna vinOdA shrIda

caraNam 1

 sharaNadi moraliDu narulanu brOcE birudu nIdE gAdA raghunAtha 
sAra hInamagu ghOra bhavAdhini jErina nAdu vicAramu diRcci
  
caraNam 2

 dina dinamunu pada vanajamulanu ati vinayamunanu namminAniganu 
rAmacandra shrI rAmapurAdhipa rAmadAsa hrddhAma dayALO
